src:
Ništa dobro za Zmajeve
Cedevita Olimpija zasad ima pet poraza u evropskom takmičenju

06 Nov 2019

Koliko dobro sezona ide za Cedevita Olimpiju na Jadranu, toliko loše sve deluje u Evrokupu gde trenutno imaju apsolutno sve poraze. Iako su na startu ovog evropskog takmičenja igrali sasvim korektno i dobro parirali rivalima, potpuni krah se desio prethodne sedmice protiv Huventuda u Badaloni kada su primili stotku. Večeras će gostovati Darušafaki, koja ima velike ambicije da se plasira u drugu fazu takmičenja.
Teško je ne uvideti da bi možda sve bilo drugačije po Zmajeve da su baš u tom prvom kolu protiv Darušafake došli do pobede. Odigrali su fantastičnu prvu četvrtinu, u jednom trenutku su imali čak 14 poena na svojoj vodenici, ali su onda naprasno stali, dozvolili turskom sastavu da upiše čak 13 poena u nizu i da već do poluvremena povede. Pokušavala je ekipa iz Stožica da se donekle vrati u igru u drugom poluvremenu, činilo se da će u tome i uspeti, ali je Darušafaka ipak uspela da stavi konačnu tačku na meč.



Cedevita Olimpija na meč u Istanbul putuje nakon prvog poraza u ABA ligi od ekipe Mornara u Baru, koji je obeležio veliki incident na kraju utakmice kada je jedan navijač domaće ekipe uleteo na teren i napao Rajana Boutrajta trubom, nakon što se ovaj pomalo i nesportski poneo i ukrao loptu domaćima kada su ovi samo želeli da istroše vreme do kraja utakmice, jer je sve bilo rešeno.
Bilo kako bilo, trener Zmajeva, Slaven Rimac, pred gostovanje u Istanbulu ima velika očekivanja i kaže da ga ne interesuje podatak da njegov tim trenutno ima sve poraze u Evrokupu.„Svaka utakmica u Evrokupu je za nas posebna, jer imamo određena očekivanja. Bez obzira na dosadašnje poraze, moramo duel sa Darušafakom uzeti za ozbiljno, prikazati bolju predstavu i igru u odnosu na poslednje dve utakmice. Na meču sa Mornarom u Baru smo ponovo samo deo susreta odigrali dobro, a nakon toga je usledio veliki pad u igri. To moramo popraviti kako znamo i umemo. Darušafaka će večeras biti daleko motivisanija pošto ova utakmica dosta znači u borbi za plasman u drugu fazu. Naš motiv sigurno neće biti doveden u pitanje, ali moramo pokazati. Verujem momcima i ostatku stručnog štaba“, istakao je Rimac.
Ljubljanski tim nakon ovog meča za vikend očekuje i veliki slovenački derbi za vrh tabele u ABA ligi. Protivnik će biti ekipa Primorske i to u Kopru, što bi mogla da bude izuzetno teška utakmica za ekipu iz Stožica.

text:
Nothing good for Dragons
Cedevita Olympia has five defeats in European competition so far

06 Nov 2019

How well the season is going for Cedevita Olympia in the Adriatic, so bad everything works in Eurocup where they have absolutely all defeats at the moment. Although they played quite well at the start of this European competition and did well to match their rivals, a complete crash happened last week against Juventud in Badalona when they received a hundred. Tonight will be hosted by Darushafaki, who has great ambitions to advance to the second stage of the competition.
It is hard not to see that maybe it would have been different for the Dragons if they had won in that first round against Darushafaka. They played a fantastic first quarter, at one point they had as many as 14 points on their watermill, but then stopped short, allowing the Turkish team to record as many as 13 points in a row and to lead by halftime. The team from Stozice tried to return to the game in the second half, it seemed that they would succeed, but Darushafaka still managed to put the final point in the match.



Cedevita Olympia travels to Istanbul after their first defeat in the ABA league by the Navy team at Bar, which marked a major incident at the end of the match when a home team fan stormed the field and attacked Ryan Boutright with a trumpet and stole the home team when they just wanted to run out of time for the rest of the game because everything was settled.
However, the Dragons coach, Slaven Rimac, has high expectations ahead of his visit to Istanbul and says that he is not interested in the fact that his team currently has all the defeats in Eurocup. "Every match in Eurocup is special for us because we have certain expectations. Regardless of the defeats so far, we have to take the match with Darushafak seriously, to show a better performance and play compared to the last two games. In the match with Sailor at Bar, we again played only part of the match well, followed by a major setback in the game. We need to fix that as we know and know. Darushafaka will be far more motivated tonight as this game means a lot in the fight for the second stage placement. Our motive will certainly not be called into question, but we must show. I trust the guys and the rest of the professional staff, "Rimac said.
After this weekend's match, the Ljubljana team expects a big Slovenian derby to top the ABA league table. The opponent will be the Primorska team in Koper, which could be an extremely difficult game for the team from Stozice.
